reviewText: What a lot of fun. More entertaining than most things on tv these days. Would have given it 5 stars but felt it was a little short.
Son loved the video we continue to watch it over and over

My kids love Monster Jam, and I looked at several dvd's for Christmas gifts before making my choice. I picked this one because it was all about crashing, which is the best part of Monster Jam. It includes two volumes: Crash Madness 5 & 6. My kids kept shouting, "Whoa!" and "Oh, man!" over and over as they watched. It was a good choice.
This dvd is excellant. Great collection of Monster truck Mayhem, tricks and destruction. Very entertaining to watch with some amazing stunts!
My son is autistic and has a thing for Monster Trucks.  This was a perfect choice for him.  Great transaction.
